long_description: Protect your Petzl headlamp from damaging impacts and scrapes with the Petzl Poche Tikka(R) 2 headlamp pouch. Molded foam casing conveniently stows all Petzl Tikka-, Zipka-, Tikka 2- and Zipka 2-series headlamps. Zippered clamshell opening with mesh gussets provides simple access to the interior. Small inner pocket holds extra batteries or lenses. Webbing loop creates versatile attachment options-wear it on your backpack hipbelt or shoulder strap, or clip it on with a carabiner (sold separately). Not designed for headlamps fitted with the Petzl Adapt Tikka 2 system.
short_description: Protect your Petzl headlamp from damaging impacts and scrapes with the Petzl Poche Tikka(R) 2 headlamp pouch.
